string-array.name: create_tables
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE `thought` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL,`user_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`lang_id` int(255) DEFAULT NULL,`group_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`content` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`image` varchar(0) DEFAULT NULL,`time` varchar(255) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `user_msg` (`id` int(11) NOT,`sender_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`recver_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`time` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`content` varchar(255) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
